command.noPlayer: This shouldn't happen. Please contact the developers!

item.itemNoPrice: This item doesn't have a price!
item.holdingItemNoPrice: The item you're holding doesn't have a price!
item.invalidAmount: The amount must be between %s and %s!
item.invalidStack: Your item stack contains invalid data!

inventory.empty: You don't have any valuable items in your inventory!
inventory.value: You have %s valuable items in your inventory.

chat.clickableNickname: Click, to see the real name.

includeStackSize.description: If the whole stack price should be displayed or only the single item price
includeStackSize.name: Show stack price

priceFormat.description: How prices should be displayed. You can use §b{price}§r as a placeholder for prices.
priceFormat.name: Price format

hideNonPrices.description: When enabled, the widget will only be visible if the current item has a valid price
hideNonPrices.name: Only show valid prices

forceRefetch.description: Checks if there is a new player record.
forceRefetch.name: Force refetch

onlyShowWhenConnected.description: When enabled, this widget will only show when connected to §bopsucht.net§r.
onlyShowWhenConnected.name: Only show when connected

autoFly.description:
Automatically execute §b/fly §feverytime you join a sub server of §bOPSUCHT.net§f.
Only works with §cPLATIN §fand higher ranks.
autoFly.name: AutoFly

coloredMentions.description: Every instance of @<Name> you receive as a chat message gets replaced by the colored version §b@<Name>
coloredMentions.name: Colored mentions

clanInviteBullet.description: Adds the option to send a clan invite to the player.
clanInviteBullet.name: Send Clan Invite

friendRequestBullet.description: Adds the option to send a friend request to the player.
friendRequestBullet.name: Send friend request

payBullet.description: Adds the option to pay a player money.
payBullet.name: Pay money
